custom_edit_url: null
---

<div>

</div>

**Type**: TSInterface

|PROPERTY|TYPE|DEFAULT|DESCRIPTION|
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|hitTest|number|1|<p>size ratio to find items. Use it if <code>padding</code> inside the item plays the same role as <code>margin</code> or <code>gap</code>.<br /></p>|
|intersection|boolean \| number|0|<p>A number indicating how much the items intersect on the side. (true is 1)</p><br /><ul><br /><li>If 0, there is no intersect. The closer it is to 1, the greater the intersect distance.<br /></li><br /></ul>|
|sibling|number|0|<p>The number of items next to the item's index to return.<br /></p>|
|align|"start" \| "end" \| "center"||<p>The position to align the target to.<br /></p>|
|excludeStand|boolean|false|<p>Whether to find the next item except sorting it in place.<br /></p>|
|offset|number|0|<p>The value to scroll further from the sort position.<br /></p>|
|duration|number|0|<p>How long to scroll animation time.<br /></p>|
